page.title: 17Services, Wickhambreaux.
page.content: {Main drainage}came to{Stodmarsh}in the 1980's; a sewage works was built in the{Newnham Valley.}This service was very good for the people because before that they had{cesspools}and a special lorry had to empty them. There are a few people that are so far out of the village that they have not got {main drainage.}When the main drains were layed there was great confusion because the roads had to be closed, being so narrow. There used to be a{water pump}on Stodmarsh Village Green but in 1946 mains water was brought to the village. Some people who did not have water brought into their houses used a tap on the village green. { Electricity}was brought to Stodmarsh in 1954. Electricity wires and{telephone}wires are still over-head. There is no gas.
